archimate:Principle.name: Operability
archimate:Principle.documentation:
Services and solutions must be designed so that they can be operated efficiently to meet the expectations for the services and solutions. ​
Designs and plans must consider how the service or solution will be operated and how operations requirements are met. ​
Solutions and services need to address requirements for interoperability. Architecture designs need to strive for interoperable, configurable services and leveraging APIs and open standards.​
